Developer Terms of Use
des: This station is a Christian faith base station, not bound by anything other than Gods word. We are here to entertain, educate, uplift, and encourage all people. Let’s create a community willing to improve the three pillars of life. Faith, Finance, and Lifestyle are all intertwined to create balance. Captivating mind radio is here to stimulate those areas in many different ways, welcome.
